snippet: The Supreme Court announced on Friday that it would decide whether human genes may be patented, setting out to tackle the legal question if isolated genes are “human-made inventions” or “products of nature.”
abstract: Supreme Court announces that it will hear case involving company Myriad Genetics on whether human genes may be patented; also considers requests for, but does not take action yet on, cases concerning same-sex marriage.
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court announced on Friday that it would decide whether human genes may be patented, setting out to tackle the legal question if isolated genes are “human-made inventions” or “products of nature.”

headline.seo: Supreme Court Takes Up Question of Gene Research
headline.main: Supreme Court to Look at a Gene Issue
headline.print_headline: Supreme Court to Look at a Gene Issue

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
